cards.name: Arena
cards.originalText: o3,ocT: Choose one of your creatures and have your opponent choose one of his or her creatures. Both target creatures become tapped. Your creature does its power in damage to your opponent's creature, and your opponent's creature does its power in damage to yours.

rulings.text: The power of the creatures when the effect resolves is used to determine how much damage is done.
In multiplayer games, you can choose a different opposing player each time it the ability is activated.
Either or both creatures can be tapped prior to using the ability and it still works.

If either target is illegal at the time the ability resolves (whether because it has left the battlefield, because it has gained Shroud or Protection, or for any other reason), the ability taps the remaining target, but no damage is dealt. If both targets are illegal, the ability doesn’t resolve.

cards.text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature you control and target creature of an opponent's choice they control. Those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

cards.name: Sewers of Estark
cards.originalText: Choose one Target attacking creature is unblockable this turn; or prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target blocking creature and all creatures it's blocking this turn.

rulings.text: This spell can target any creature. The check for whether that creature is attacking or blocking made on resolution, and it will have the appropriate effect at that time.
If the creature is neither an attacking creature nor a blocking creature at the time the spell resolves, it will have no effect.

cards.text: Choose target creature. If it's attacking, it can't be blocked this turn. If it's blocking, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this combat by it and each creature it's blocking.

cards.flavorText: Loyal and passionate in battle, the Windseeker tribe roams the Green Lands near the Honeyed Sea.
cards.name: Windseeker Centaur
cards.originalText: Attacking does not cause Windseeker Centaur to tap.

cards.flavorText: The wizard Greensleeves called a Giant Badger to her aid in an battle with the desert mage Karli.
cards.name: Giant Badger
cards.originalText: If assigned as a blocker, Giant Badger gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.text: Whenever Giant Badger blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Mana Crypt
cards.originalText:
During your upkeep, flip a coin. Opponent calls heads or tails while coin is in the air. If flip ends up in opponent's favor, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
ocT: Add two colorless mana to your mana pool. Play this ability as an interrupt.

rulings.text: No player may choose to take actions between determining the result of the flip and damage being dealt if you lost the flip.

cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.
